.Net Web Application Developer — Rapidparts, Inc.

Submitted by Anonymous (not verified) on Fri, 03/18/2011 - 10:01

Rapidparts is hiring a .Net Web Application Developer
To apply: http://www.rapidpartsinc.com/Join_Position.aspx?job=web_developer

At Rapidparts, the web development team builds industry leading software for the Mitsubishi Caterpillar Forklift America (MCFA) dealer network. Our work is often the main point of interaction with our customers, dealers, and fellow employees. Our focus is to create raving fans of our applications that insist on using our solutions in their daily routines. In short, our work matters.

We are currently expanding our development team in an ongoing effort to provide new applications and features for our users. As a Rapidparts developer, you will be involved in all aspects of solution development, including analysis, design, development, testing, documentation, and support. We need smart, motivated people who want to work with other smart, motivated people; all for the benefit of our users.

A web developer with demonstrable C# and HTML/CSS/Javascript experience is an absolute requirement. We are given the freedom to use the latest frameworks and tools to craft our solutions and desire a candidate that has experience with some or all of the tools listed below. The ideal candidate must believe learning and continuous improvement are primary responsibilities of a software developer. Participation in the development community (open source projects, avid blog reader, commenter, or writer) is a big plus.

Characteristics of the ideal candidate:

  • A team player with high integrity that is committed to continuous improvement
  • Keeps a customer focus when developing solutions
  • Understands computer science and business analysis
  • Motivated and disciplined programmer who can move quickly around the .Net development environment

If you embody these characteristics and possess one or more areas of specialization with the following skills and tools, we want to meet you.

Technical Skills of the ideal candidate:

  • Domain-driven design
  • Test-driven development
  • Continuous integration
  • ORM frameworks
  • Dependency Injection/Inversion of Control
  • Database normalization/denormalization
  • Build and deployment automation
  • Web service development
  • Web accessibility standards
  • Performance/Load testing
  • Agile development
  • Mobile web development

Specific Tool Experience Desired:

  • ASP.NET MVC
  • JSON, XML
  • SQL Server 2008 R2
  • Fluent NHibernate
  • StructureMap
  • REST and SOAP
  • Tarantino Database Migrations
  • ReSharper
  • Subversion
  • TeamCity, Nant, Web Deploy
  • nUnit
  • NServiceBus
  • Silverlight

Rapidparts is an Equal Opportunity /Affirmative Action Employer committed to quality through diversity M/F/D/V.

Rapidparts is hiring a .Net Web Application Developer
To apply: http://www.rapidpartsinc.com/Join_Position.aspx?job=web_developer
